asgNldsc.statement: Learn to notice and name your feelings in the present moment.

The aim is to step out of the stream of thoughts and gently shift your attention to your own emotions.
Exercises like this build your ability to focus. Our minds often dwell on the past or the future, and by returning to the present moment, you lessen the pull of anxious feelings.
